alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:58PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 430 PM MST... At 357 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Top-Of-The-World, or 9 miles east of Superior, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, Central Heights-Midland City and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 230 and 246. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 214 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Tonto Basin
